ComicInfo.Summary:
BUCKET LIST CONCLUDES!
He was Wade's hero. He took Wade under his wing.
Things didn't go the way Wade hoped.
Now, Wade wants to beat the ever-living snot out of Captain America.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Mike Hawthorne & Nathan Fairbairn | 1 | | Var | Secret Comic Variant Cover | Gerry Duggan, Scott Koblish, Guru-eFX & Joe Sabino | 2 | | Var | The New Mutants Variant Cover | Declan Shalvey | Missing |
ComicInfo.Title: Bucket List Part Five: Steve & Wade & Kicking & Punching
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Declan Shalvey,Gerry Duggan,Guru-eFX,Joe Sabino,Mike Hawthorne,Nathan Fairbairn,Scott Koblish
